subSections.title: Etymology 1
Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to be [[competent]]
# to [[win]]
# to [[encroach]] on
# to [[restrain]]
# to [[finish]]
# [[be able to]]
# to [[skimp]]
# to [[agree on]]
# [[harsh]]
# {{zh-alt-form|刻|to [[know]]}}
# to [[digest]]
# [[gram]]
# a Tibetan measuring vessel
# a Tibetan volume unit
# a Tibetan area unit
